str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

str2: From apo and stello; set apart, i.e. to send out literally or figuratively.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Jewish. From Iouda; Judaean, i.e. Belonging to Jehudah.
Comparative of presbus; older; as noun, a senior; specially, an Israelite Sanhedrist or Christian 'presbyter'.

str2: Apparently from ereo; to interrogate; by implication, to request.

str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

str2: From dia and sozo; to save thoroughly, i.e. to cure, preserve, rescue, etc.

(a) (as adj.) enslaved, (b) (as noun) a (male) slave. From deo; a slave.
